I work with RC3.
HtmlHelper.LinkTo("linkName", "controllerName", "Action") is functionnal when action isn't place in a AREA.
But, when I want to use a link with « AREA » : HtmlHelper.LinkTo("linkName", "AREA999/controllerName", "Action"). This put all other existing links in the same « AREA ».
For example, Not good : HtmlHelper.LinkTo("linkName2", " AREA999/controllerName", "Action") Good : HtmlHelper.LinkTo("linkName2", " controllerName", "Action")
Not good : HtmlHelper.LinkTo("linkName3", " AREA999/controllerName", "Action") Good : HtmlHelper.LinkTo("linkName3", " controllerName", "Action") ...
In brief, It should do for the AREA999: HtmlHelper.LinkTo("linkName", " AREA999/controllerName", "Action")
And for other actions which not in the AREA999 should return: HtmlHelper.LinkTo("linkName", " controllerName22", "Action")
BUT, instead of that, it's return HtmlHelper.LinkTo("linkName", " AREA999/ controllerName22", "Action")
I'm not sure it's a bug or I did'nt use it correctly?
